sys_script_include.name: Person Select server call

sys_update_version.name: sys_script_include_9659018b931492101f72f1ccebba1006
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>x_1344773_stitch.Person Select server call</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>true</client_callable><description>Assigned Person will be called</description><name>Person Select server call</name><script><![CDATA[var userFilters = Class.create();
userFilters.prototype = {
    initialize: function() {},
    groupuserfilters: function(groupId) {
        gs.addInfoMessage(groupId); // For debugging
        var groupMembers = new GlideRecord('sys_user_grmember');
        groupMembers.addQuery('group', groupId);
        groupMembers.query();
        var query = 'sys_idIN';
        while (groupMembers.next()) {
            var userId = groupMembers.getValue('user');
            query += userId + ',';
        }
        query = query.slice(0, -1);
        return query;
    },
    type: 'userFilters'
};]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-09-02 00:26:06</sys_created_on><sys_id>9659018b931492101f72f1ccebba1006</sys_id><sys_mod_count>4</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Person Select server call</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Stitch" source="x_1344773_stitch">888cb566931012101f72f1ccebba10f4</sys_package><sys_policy>read</sys_policy><sys_scope display_value="Stitch">888cb566931012101f72f1ccebba10f4</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_9659018b931492101f72f1ccebba1006</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-09-02 13:26:06</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>
